page.title: 08TOTLAND BROWNIES I O W
page.content:
At Brownies in Totland,Isle of Wight there is a Brown-owl a Tawny owl and a Guide.We sometimes give concerts to Green Meadows,the old people's home.At brownies we play two's and three's.We have Brownie revels too.We sing songs and have parties.Sometimes we go out on the grass and play games.Then we do hard work doing our badges.We go to Brownies at 5 o'clock and come home at half past six.There is a small cloakroom but we put our coats on the chairs there.There are four corners one is called Sprites,one Elves,one Pixies and lastly Gnomes.We sometimes make cakes with a marshmallow,jam and some little balls. When we leave Brownies at 10yrs of age,we go to Guides.
Victoria Hodson 8 years
